value.string: Command : Loop - Condition - Window does not Exist

Use Case: Verify Loop Window does not Exists Condition on IE window title as Plain text
Show child and hidden windows : False
Check the condition at the end of the iteration : False

Use Case: Verify Loop Window does not Exists Condition
Show child and hidden windows : True
Check the condition at the end of the iteration : True

Use Case: Verify Loop Window Exists Condition
Show child and hidden windows : False
Check the condition at the end of the iteration : False
Wait till 10 seconds to open IE

Check the condition at the end of the iteration : False
